I also found J.D. Walker’s fees surprisingly low for all of the services they provide. They truly did make dealing with our immigration laws a tolerable experience. name: Lowell Francis
text:
I got naturalized in 2016 through marriage to a US citizen.

1. I came to the US,  May 2012 on a J1 Cultural Exchange Visa, Met US citizen, got married October 2012, Applied for adjustment of status Nov 2012 then obtained a conditional greencard May 2013.
2. Applied for removal of condition Mar 2015.got new greencard Nov 2015
3. Applied for Naturalization March 2016 (3 year rule) got naturalized July 2016.

Red Flags and Problems
1. I got an outside child in 2015 with another US citizen while married.
2. My now ex wife asked for a divorce shortly after I became citizen (September 2016.)
3. I got remarried Nov 2016 to a person from my country of birth who came to the US on a visitor's visa
4. Submitted I-130 and & I-485 for my new wife to be able to adjust status Feb 2017
5 Got interviewed Dec 2017. (stoke interview on site) we were both  separated and questioned then ask to sign statements.

My case  pretty much  had all the red flag that that USCIS looks for, and I made the mistake of going down that road myself .

USCIS was not happy with the fact that I got divorced only months after being naturalized, they did not like the fact that I got remarried so quickly after the divorce, they did not like the fact that my new wife was from the same country that I am originally from , they did not like the fact that she got married to me within 90 days of entering the USA on a visitors visa. they did not like the fact that I got an outside child while I was married to my ex (first wife)

I hired JD walker after I realized that I was under suspicion for marriage fraud, This was the single best decision I made through my immigration journey, JD Walker took over my immigration case that was dragging for over 2 years successfully got USCIS to issue my wife a 10 years permanent residency card. we now have a child together and are about to close on our first family home.

I highly recommend using this law firm to represent you in immigration matters, JD walker is well known among his community and is highly respected by the USCIS officers in the Atlanta and Montgomery location for his success in immigration matters

Thank you JD Walker!!!!

resp.text: Thank you for allowing us to represent you are your family. We are always here to help.

name: Lydia Haile
text: JD walker  was there for me and won my deportation case. I was ordered deported and was detained for many months and was going to be deported to my home country. Mr. Walker stopped my deportation, reopened my case, removed my deportation order and obtained my release. From that moment on, Mr. Walker was always with me during my saga to legalize my status and stand up for my rights. HE FOUGHT FOR ME -- for years in the district courts and the immigration courtrooms and in different cities. My bond hearing was in Louisiana, and Mr. Walker was there for me. Mr. Walker was there for me at the Memphis court to help me obtain my lawful permanent residency. My immigration case was never easy. Even on the last day of my immigration trial, it was a very contested hearing. We won and JD Walker many times spoke up for me, made numerous objections, protected my rights, made sure that I was treated like a human being and with respect. And Mr. Walker later represented my cousin . The day before my cousin’s interview, there was a big snow storm in Birmingim  and the flights were cancelled. Mr. Walker left the airport and drove  overnight (THROUGH A SNOW STORM) so he could be with us at 8:00 a.m. the next morning. My cousin  got her green card, thanks to JD Walker. What Mr. Walker did for me and my family was amazing and is superhuman.

resp.text: Thank you for allowing us to represent you are your family. We are always here to help.

text: I'm glad I turned to this law firm for my family's needs. It has been a very confusing transition but Mrs. Rameriz is very knowledgeable and her communication is very open. I'm impressed with the timely manner that she has gotten things done. She is easy to work with and affordable. She is not only their to take your money but she delivers whatever it is that she is working towards. I highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you Cyrille for your kind review. We're so happy for your outcome. We are so fortunate to have Lisa in our team. The WIL Team.

name: Ginger Cendoma
text: The attorney Lisa was very helpful with the process of obtaining visa for our family. She was responsive to e-mails and phone calls. She provided assistance when we needed help to collect documents. We felt at ease with the information and help she gave us. We didn’t worry about the process.

resp.text: We're so happy with the outcome of your case. Thank you and your family  for being such great clients. - The WIL Team

name: Kennia Martinez
text: I would definitely recommend lawyer Lisa and the Weinstock company to anyone.  They did everything they said they would. They were always available whenever I had a question or concern. If a message or email was left, I had a call back or answer within a few hours.I was always treated with honesty and respect

resp.text: Thank you Kennia for your great review. We are so happy with the outcome. Thanks for being a great client. - The WIL Team.

name: sheree graham
text:
The best attorney in town, from day one they took care of us and kept us updated and made sure all the paperwork were thoroughly done and followed up as and when due. Lisa and everyone working here are top notch professionals and are very hardworking.
Thank you Weinstock Immigration Lawyers.

resp.text: Awww. That's so sweet. Thank you for your business and your wonderful review. This made our day. Thanks again, Sheree.

text: The attorney Lisa was very dedicated to helping us with to ensure my mom’s were filed correctly and everything that should have been submitted was included the first time. We recommend her work for family immigration.

resp.text: Thank you Andrew for your kind review. Thanks for trusting us with your mom's immigration case. Your success is our success. We wish you and your family a successful future. - The WIL Team

text: Mrs.Ramirez helped me with my case fast and professionally, she’s very understanding and worked with the resources I had. An amazing lawyer and person and I appreciate all the work she does to help people in need.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your 5 Star review. We appreciate your trust ann happy to call you our client. Wishing you and your family a successful and healthy future. - The WIL Team

text:
(Translated by Google) Attorney Bingham is one of the most efficient attorneys I have ever met. The lawyer helped me with my son when he was arrested. He helped us get him a bond and represented him in court. Most importantly, he was able to get residency for my son. When we have legal questions, we always go to him. I always recommend your services to my family and friends.

Lo más importante es que pudo obtenerle la residencia a mi hijo. Cuando tenemos dudas legales, siempre acudimos a el. Siempre recomiendo sus servicios a mis familiares y amigos.

name: Victorio h Mendoza
text:
(Translated by Google) I highly recommend Mr Bingham, he is an honest lawyer, he speaks to you with the truth when you present your case, I face deportation due to my ignorance of getting immigration papers with a notary, but thanks to him I won my case and I obtained my residence and another Judges in Atlanta know him and respect him for his work, which he does very well. I said that I had to appear 4 times at the immigration court.

Yo recomiendo mucho Mr Bingham el es un abogado honesto te habla con la verdad cuando le expones tu caso yo enfrente deportacion por la ignorancia mia de llegar papeles de imigaracion con un notario Pero gracias a el gane mi caso y obtuve mi residencia y otra cosa los jueces en Atlanta lo conocen y respetan por su trabajo que hace muy bien lo digo yo que tube que presentarme 4 veces a corte de migracion gracias Mr Bingham

name: Dave
text: My wife and I were in desperate need of a lawyer after the one we had hoped on cancelled on us the day of the appointment. We found Mr.Stoner online and he was able to fit us in that day, once we arrived we were welcomed by his lovely staff and incredible wife. They made us feel at home and thoroughly checked over our case. I honestly can't express enough how brilliant and kind this firm is. They are worth every penny and I would highly recommend them to friends and family.

resp.text: Thank you, Dave, for those kind words.  We work as a team at our law office.  Glad to know we could be there in a moment of need.

name: Jayy KORRIE RouperroW
text: Get The Job Done.  And In A Manerable Time.. Because Time Waits For Nobody

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 stars, Korrie!

name: Gaby Soto
text: If you need a lawyer right away Mr. Stoner would be the perfect lawyer to go to. He will assist you even after office hours, he will always pick up your calls, and he gives a good example of your situation.

resp.text: Thank you for the review.  We really enjoyed helping you all.

name: daisy hernandez
text: Went to a public library to get a notary signature for my marriage certificate and they told me that I couldn’t get married because my husband had to have some type of an Alabama ID and my mother as well. We called and Mrs. Stoner answered and told us that it was false information and that we didn’t need no Alabama ID to get married. Ended up getting married very quickly. Both Mr & Mrs Stoner have been great lawyers and helpful in many ways with my husband’s immigration case and helped us with our marriage certificate! Highly recommend!!

resp.text: Thank you, Daisy, for the review.  Always enjoy helping our friends and clients all the way through any process.  So happy for Victor and you.

name: Theresa Crisp
text: I have been to Allen Stoner several times for legal matters. He has been very professional and very courteous to my needs. Allen is a great listener but gives advice suitable for your situation. I highley recommend Mr. Stoner if you need him for anything.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback and support.

name: Gustave Fredrick
text: I would like to thank Allen, Cookie, and their staff for applying excellent service, personal attention, and professionalism towards my wife's immigration case. It felt as though our case was the only one they were dealing with throughout the process. They were with us from the beginning of our journey to the end. I would definitely recommend Allen Stoner to both family and friends.

resp.text: Gus, thank you for the kind words.  We appreciate those words of encouragement.

name: Holly Addison
text: Mr. Allen Stoner was able to help my son and I achieve something I never thought we’d be able to. Him and his wife were so wonderfully kind and not only did they stay on top of everything, but they made it all so easy for us too. They knew what steps needed to be taken and what information was needed The Minute I stepped into the office. I’ve seen multiple attorneys throughout Decatur and Huntsville and not one of them compared to Allen Stoner. I can’t put into words how thankful I am for Mr. and Mrs. Stoner.

name: Megan Khan
text: After my husband and I got married we had no idea how we would apply for his green card. We stayed in touch and I knew they would be perfect to assist us with the immigration paperwork. They are all so caring, knowledgeable, and helpful. Any questions we had through the process were answered quickly. I would recommend Allen’s law office to anyone seeking help with immigration. I can’t thank them enough for everything they have done for our family.
